# Hypixelpy
Simple wrapper for Hypixel API

## Features
<details>
    <summary>Click to see all features!</summary>

    API:
      ✔️ API Key Information
    Player:
      ✔️ Player Data
      ✔️ Player's Friends
      ✔️ Recently Played Games
      ✔️ Player's Status
      ✔️ Guild
    Resources:
      ✔️ Achievements
      ✔️ Challenges
      ✔️ Quests
      ✔️ Guild Achievements
      ✔️ Guild Permissions
    Skyblock:
      ✔️ Collections
      ✔️ Skills
      ✔️ News
      ✔️ Auctions by player, profile or UUID
      ✔️ Active Auctions
      ✔️ Recently Ended Auctions
      ✔️ Bazaar
      ✔️ Bazaar Item IDs
      ✔️ Profile by UUID
      ✔️ Player's Profiles
    Other:
      ✔️ Active Network Booster
      ✔️ Current Player Counts
      ✔️ Current Leaderboards
      ✔️ Punishment Statistics
    Game Types:
      ✔️ IDs
      ✔️ Type Names
      ✔️ Database Names
      ✔️ Clean Names
</details>

---
